name: Ball of Poo
description:
You're Dung Beetle Chan. Maneuver the ball of poo to the goal high in the sky but don't get knocked off or fall because you'll have to start over.

Features

  • Realistic physics!
  • Realistic sound effects!
  • Dung Beetle Chan!

Also features many classical pieces by Mozart, Grieg, Offenbach and more!

Bonus Fun Dung Beetle Fact:
Scarabs which were revered as sacred by ancient Egyptians were actually dung beetles.
